![Screenshot of DC++](https://dcplusplus.sourceforge.io/img/screenshot.png)	

## Welcome to DC++

DC++ announces the freedom to share! DC++ is an open source client for Windows for the [Direct Connect](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Direct_Connect_(file_sharing)) / [Advanced Direct Connect network](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Direct_Connect).

Direct Connect allows you to share files over the Internet without restrictions or limits. The client is completely free of advertisements and has a nice, easy to use interface. Firewall and router support is integrated and it is easy and convenient to use functionality like multi-hub connections, auto-connections and resuming of downloads.

DC++ is a highly ranked piece of software among the projects hosted at Sourceforge. With more than fifty million downloads, new users continue to find benefits from the software every day.

DC++ is free software, licensed under the [GNU GPL 2](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html).

## First time user?

New user on Direct Connect and unsure what to do? Best to start with our [quick tutorial](http://dcplusplus.sourceforge.net/tutorial.html) as it contains plenty of screenshots and shows you the basic usage of DC++.

If you're new to DC++, don't hesitate to take a moment to browse the webhelp and [read the beginners guide](http://dcplusplus.sourceforge.net/webhelp/get_started.html). However, the simplicity of the software user interface will help you get started in no-time.
